Package org.openhubframework.openhub.core.alerts

Alerts implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlertsCheckingService
    Contract defines alerts checking.
    AlertsDao
    DAO for calling SQL queries.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAlertsCheckingService
    Default implementation of AlertsCheckingService interface.
    AbstractAlertsConfiguration
    Parent class for alerts configuration.
    AlertsCheckingServiceDbImpl
    Database implementation of AlertsCheckingService interface.
    AlertsJdbcDao
    Spring JDBC implementation of AlertsDao.
    AlertsJmxConfiguration
    Alerts configuration via JMX.
    AlertsPropertiesConfiguration
    Alerts configuration via Properties.
    AlertsSchedulerRoute
    Route definition that starts checking alerts by scheduler.
    EmailAlertListenerSupport
    Listener implementation that sends email notifications to admin mails.
